settings.title: Made in Grasse
settings.text: Crafted in the perfume capital of the world, where centuries of savoir-faire meet modern innovation.

settings.title: IPRA Partnership
settings.text: Proud partner of the International Fragrance Association. Safe, transparent, and responsibly crafted.

settings.title: Free Delivery
settings.text: Complimentary shipping on orders over a set threshold. Fast and reliable delivery across France and beyond.

settings.title: Secure Payment
settings.text: Your payment is protected. We use industry-standard encryption and trusted payment providers.

settings.heading: Les Parfums de la Côte d'Azur
settings.text: Découvrez nos diffuseurs et huiles parfumées de luxe, créés à Grasse en partenariat avec l'IPRA. Collections inspirées des palaces et des grands parfumeurs. Livraison gratuite.
